# delegate

**Instance Property**

The object that handles Writing Tools interactions for your view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any NSWritingToolsCoordinator.Delegate)? { get }
```

## Discussion

Specify this object at initialization time when creating your `NSWritingToolsCoordinator` object. The object must adopt the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWritingToolsCoordinator/Delegate-swift.protocol] protocol, and be capable of modifying your view’s text storage and refreshing the view’s layout and appearance.

## Managing Writing Tools interactions

- **NSWritingToolsCoordinator.Delegate**: An interface that you use to manage interactions between Writing Tools and your custom text view.
- **view**: The view that currently uses the writing tools coordinator.
